title: 14 Day banned for intentional feeding for playing none meta champs bot?
body:
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2832748642/31077453?tab=overview

result: my team won this game, due to the way bounty system is designed I was basically tanking.  I was ADC gangplank and did bad but my build is legit.

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2829197057/31077453?tab=overview

result: I lose as shaco jungle with a legit build our team just got dominated

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2831424072/31077453?tab=overview

result: I accidentally leave on Smite as Ash but I build legit and game goes on for 33 mins we almost won this game too I am getting flamed entire game and trying my best 


I can understand banning trolls but I am just doing none meta things or made one mistake.  None of these games I intentionally fed in.

replies.body:
Question on the Shaco game: Why did the enemy Darius wind up with so many of the kills on you? Darius doesn't seem like a great target to gank as Shaco, but it looks like you kept trying and failing several times. 

Were chat logs provided?

> [{quoted}](name=Jo0o,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=lRKPAGJR,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-07-28T12:22:25.968+0000)
>
> Question on the Shaco game: Why did the enemy Darius wind up with so many of the kills on you? Darius doesn't seem like a great target to gank as Shaco, but it looks like you kept trying and failing several times. 
> 
> Were chat logs provided?

They didnt give me chat logs.

Yes I tried to kill Darius but failed by very close margins.

I think there's a few things going on in your games. Sometimes it appears you're intentionally feeding, other times it's like you're not paying any attention to the game. This leads me to believe you were chatting a lot during the game as well, and that may have also contributed to your punishment. It's difficult to say that your actions were intentional, except for a few deaths in your GP game. I'd write a support ticket to ask for some clarification.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=lRKPAGJR,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-07-28T08:20:16.912+0000)
>
> I think there's a few things going on in your games. Sometimes it appears you're intentionally feeding, other times it's like you're not paying any attention to the game. This leads me to believe you were chatting a lot during the game as well, and that may have also contributed to your punishment. It's difficult to say that your actions were intentional, except for a few deaths in your GP game. I'd write a support ticket to ask for some clarification.

I did put in a support ticket.

I haven't been playing League as much anyway and this meta has crazy damage sometimes.    I know I do bad in two of these games pretty horribly but is that really a reason to ban me for 14 days?  This honestly makes me so sad.  I am a decent player but I have not been playing good lately because I have a slight tremor and it has been worse for the last few weeks.  I even won the Gangplank game and I got many assists and good vision score.  

I do remember in the Ahri game she was extremely mad at me the entire game even though I got her first blood, but I didn't talk to her that much.   I also remember being typed at in chat in the Gangplank and Ash games, but I didn't talk that much in the Ash game and tried to stay positive.  The Gangplank game at the endchat I joked with the enemy team and they all reported me because they were very upset they lost to me.

I am glad it is a temp ban instead of a permanent ban but this has shaken my faith in riots system because basically I am higher then where I should be in my mmr ranking I think.
Aye dear...... these games look pretty legit, you just preformed badly, your best luck is to go [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and submit a ticket.

From what I can tell by the graphs it looks like in the gangplank lane you lost because you happened to get hooked by blitz quite early on. The shaco game doesn't even look close to inting - 8 deaths is far less than you'd expect from someone who is actually inting, and your first death is at a time where both teams were even so it was probably a failed gank. AS for the ashe game, were you premades with Jinx? If not, which one of you got assigned adc? Or was it blind pick?
there is no reason to die more than 15 times in a 30 minute game, other than intentionally feeding.

You fed to such an extent that it shouldn't matter if it was intentional or not. You may be able to contact support and have them take away that ban, but there should be some sort of punishment for feeding that hard in Ranked.
